-1em,0 3em 0 -1em,-2em 2em 0 0,-3em 0 0 0,-2em -2em 0 .2em}}.home{display:none;flex-direction:column;background-color:#192231}.home .header{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;padding:2rem;align-items:center;box-shadow:var(--box-shadow);background:#131c29;border-bottom:.5px solid #e7e7e7}.home .header__logo{color:#fff}.home .header__post{box-shadow:var(--box-shadow);padding:.5rem 2rem;color:#fff;border:1px solid;cursor:pointer;transition:all .3s}.home .header__post:hover{background-color:#fff;color:#131c29}.home .header__post-limit{display:none;box-shadow:var(--box-shadow);padding:.5rem 2rem;color:#fff;border:1px solid;cursor:pointer;transition:all .3s}.home .header__post-limit:hover{background-color:#fff;color:#131c29}.home .main{padding:4rem}.home .main .allPost{display:flex;flex-flow:row wrap;justify-content:space-between}.home .main .allPost .post{background-color:#24344d;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;flex-basis:23%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;box-shadow:var(--box-shadow);padding:2rem;border-radius:var(--border-radius);margin-bottom:1.5rem;transition:all .3s}@media screen and (max-width:900px){.home .main .allPost .post{flex-basis:30%}}@media screen and (max-width:650px){.home .main .allPost .post{flex-basis:49%}}@media screen and .allPost .post__body p{padding-bottom:1rem;font-size:1.4rem}.home .main .allPost .post__user p span{font-weight:700;padding-right:.5rem}.home .main .pagination{padding:3rem 0;cursor:pointer}.home .main .pagination,.home .main .pagination__list{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.home .main .pagination__list{list-style-type:none;flex-flow:row wrap}.home .main .pagination__list-item{padding:1rem;width:4rem;border:1px solid .pagination__list-item:hover{border:1px solid #fff;color:#24344d;background-color:#fff}.details{display:none;flex-direction:column}.details .headerD__logo{color:#fff}.details .headerD__post{display:flex;position:relative}.details .headerD__post a{text-decoration:none;color:#fff}.details .headerD .favourite__list{position:absolute;top:3rem;right:8rem;width:225px;background:#deb887;border-radius:var(--border-radius);box-shadow:var(--box-shadow);display:none}.details .headerD .favourite__list .favourite__ul{border-radius:var(--border-radius);list-style-type:none}.details .headerD .favourite__list .favourite__ul-li{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;padding:1rem}.details .headerD .favourite__list .favourite__ul-li:hover{background-color:#24344d;color:#fff}.details .headerD .favourite__list .favpostDetails{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.details .headerD .favourite__list .favpostDetails .title{font-weight:700}.details .headerD .favourite__list .favpostDetails .username{font-size:1.2rem}.details .headerD .favourite__list .favDeletePost{z-index:10000}.details .main .wrapper{color:#fff;display:flex;justify-content:center;padding:5rem;flex-direction:column;background-color:#192231}.details .main .wrapper .postD{padding-bottom:5rem}.details .main .wrapper .postD__title{font-size:3rem;font-weight:700;padding-bottom:1rem;display:flex;flex-direction:column-reverse;align-items:flex-start}.details .main .wrapper .postD__fav:hover{background-color:#fff;color:#000}.details .main .wrapper .postD__fav-del{display:none;cursor:pointer;font-size:1.5rem;border:1px solid;padding:.5rem 1rem;transition:all .3s;margin-bottom:1rem}.details .main .wrapper .postD__fav-del:hover{background-color:#fff;color:#000}.details .main .wrapper .postD__user{padding-bottom:3rem}.details .main .wrapper .postD__user p span{font-weight:700}.details .main .wrapper .headingc{font-size:3rem;font-weight:700;padding-bottom:3rem}.details .main .wrapper .comments{word-break:break-all}.details .main .wrapper .comments .commentbox{box-shadow:var(--box-shadow);border-radius:var(--border-radius);padding:2rem;background-color:#24344d;margin-bottom:2rem}.details .main .wrapper .comments
